name: Mummy
description: This Pokemon will curse whoever dares to inflict harm upon them, the curse may even last for generations and will need the aid of a medium to lift it.
effect: Whenever a foe makes Contact with this pokemon, change their ability to Mummy. Some Abilities (Flower Gift, Illusion, Imposter, Stance Change, Wonder Guard etc.) can't be switched at Storyteller's discretion.
